AT.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
AT.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 ist eine Sammlung aus fünf klassischen Handheld-Spielen, die sich sowohl in ihren originalen 80er-Jahre-Versionen als auch in runderneuerten Varianten mit aufpolierter Grafik, verbessertem Ton und erweiterten Spielelementen genießen lassen. Parachute: Rette die Fallschirmspringer, bevor sie ins Wasser fallen. Helmet: Weiche den herabfallenden Werkzeugen aus und gelange zum rettenden Schuppen. Chef: Jongliere solange wie möglich Zutaten mit deiner Bratpfanne. Vermin: Triff Maulwürfe und anderes Ungeziefer mit deinen Hämmern und halte sie so in Schach. Donkey Kong: Zerstöre die Plattform, auf der DK steht, während du den Fässern ausweichst.

BG.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
BG.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 is a collection of five classic handheld games; playable in their original 80s version and a remastered version with enhanced graphics, sound, and new gameplay. Parachute - catch the parachutists before they fall into the sea. Helmet - dodge the falling tools and head for the shed. Chef - juggle ingredients with your frying pan as long as you can. Vermin - use your mallets to keep the moles and other critters at bay. Donkey Kong - destroy the platform below DK while avoiding the barrels.

AU.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
AU.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 is a collection of five classic handheld games; playable in their original 80s version and a remastered version with enhanced graphics, sound, and new gameplay. Parachute - catch the parachutists before they fall into the sea. Helmet - dodge the falling tools and head for the shed. Chef - juggle ingredients with your frying pan as long as you can. Vermin - use your mallets to keep the moles and other critters at bay. Donkey Kong - destroy the platform below DK while avoiding the barrels.

BE.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
BE.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 regroupe cinq classiques de cette série de légende, dans leur version d'origine ou remastérisée avec graphiques, bandes sonores et jouabilité améliorés ! PARACHUTE : sauvez les parachutistes avant qu'ils ne tombent à l'eau ! HELMET : courez vous mettre à l'abri en évitant les outils tombés du ciel ! CHEF : faites sauter les ingrédients dans votre poêle jusqu'à ce qu'ils soient à point ! VERMIN : utilisez vos maillets pour éloigner taupes et autres nuisibles ! DONKEY KONG : évitez les tonneaux et détruisez la plateforme sur laquelle se tient Donkey Kong !

GB.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
GB.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 is a collection of five classic handheld games; playable in their original 80s version and a remastered version with enhanced graphics, sound, and new gameplay. Parachute - catch the parachutists before they fall into the sea. Helmet - dodge the falling tools and head for the shed. Chef - juggle ingredients with your frying pan as long as you can. Vermin - use your mallets to keep the moles and other critters at bay. Donkey Kong - destroy the platform below DK while avoiding the barrels.

ES.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
ES.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 es una colección de cinco juegos clásicos para consola portátil. Además de la versión original de los años 80, esta compilación incluye una versión remasterizada de cada juego con nuevas reglas y gráficos y sonidos mejorados. Parachute: recoge a los paracaidistas antes de que caigan al mar. Helmet: esquiva los objetos que caen y llega hasta la cabaña. Chef: utiliza tu sartén para preparar toda la comida que puedas sin que caiga al suelo. Vermin: usa tus mazos para mantener a raya a los topos y a otras alimañas. Donkey Kong: esquiva los barriles y destruye la plataforma que sostiene a DK.

RU.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
RU.description: Коллекция игровых хитов 80-х обретает новую жизнь на современных консолях! Game & Watch Gallery 2 теперь доступна как в старом – классическом – исполнении, так и в новом – с яркой современной графикой. Вашему вниманию предлагается целых 5 мини-игр: Parachute. Ловите летящих парашютистов и не дайте им упасть в море, где они могут стать добычей хищной рыбины. Helmet. Вам на голову сыплется град молотков и прочих строительных снастей. Ваша задача – вовремя увильнуть от них или укрыться от бомбардировки в хижине. Chef. В этой игре вам предстоит жонглировать ингредиентами при помощи сковородки! Как долго вы сможете продержаться, ничего не уронив? Vermin. Вы – один против целой армии садовых вредителей. Прогоняйте настырных кротов и насекомых при помощи молоточков. Пусть ни один вражеский лазутчик не проникнет в ваш сад! Donkey Kong. Уничтожьте платформу под Донки Конгом, уворачиваясь от катящихся бочек, которые на ваc сбрасывает противник!

NZ.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
NZ.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 is a collection of five classic handheld games; playable in their original 80s version and a remastered version with enhanced graphics, sound, and new gameplay. Parachute - catch the parachutists before they fall into the sea. Helmet - dodge the falling tools and head for the shed. Chef - juggle ingredients with your frying pan as long as you can. Vermin - use your mallets to keep the moles and other critters at bay. Donkey Kong - destroy the platform below DK while avoiding the barrels.

PT.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
PT.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 é uma coleção composta por cinco jogos para consolas portáteis, que podem ser jogados na versão original dos anos 80 e numa versão remasterizada com gráficos e som melhorados, bem como uma nova jogabilidade. Parachute - apanha os paraquedistas antes que caiam no mar. Helmet - desvia-te das ferramentas que vão caindo e procura abrigo. Chef - faz malabarismos com os ingredientes na tua frigideira durante o máximo de tempo possível. Vermin - utiliza as tuas marretas para afastares as toupeiras e outras criaturas. Donkey Kong - destrói a plataforma por baixo de DK, ao mesmo tempo que evitas os barris.

NL.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
NL.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 is een verzameling van vijf klassieke draagbare spellen; speelbaar in de authentieke jaren 80-vorm en in de vernieuwde vorm met aangepaste beelden, geluiden en gameplay. Parachute - vang de parachutisten op voordat ze in het water vallen. Helmet - ontwijk de vallende gereedschappen en bereik de schuur. Chef - jongleer zo lang mogelijk met de ingrediënten. Vermin - houd mollen en andere vijanden op afstand met je hamers. Donkey Kong - vernietig het platform waarop Donkey Kong staat terwijl je de tonnen ontwijkt.

IT.name: Game & Watch™ Gallery 2
IT.description: Game & Watch Gallery 2 è una raccolta di cinque giochi tascabili Game & Watch: potrai giocare alla versione originale, risalente agli anni '80, oppure a quella rivisitata, con grafica e audio più moderni e un nuovo gameplay. Parachute: salva i paracadutisti prima che cadano in mare. Helmet: schiva gli oggetti in caduta libera e raggiungi la porta. Chef: fai saltare gli alimenti in padella senza farli cadere. Vermin: usa i tuoi martelli per tenere a bada le talpe e altre creature. Donkey Kong: distruggi la piattaforma che sorregge DK mentre eviti i barili.
